[~brahmareddy], thanks for the update.

Also please add one test {{TestLocalFileSystemContract}} similar to {{TestHDFSFileSystemContract}} in common. 
otherwise changes will not be really tested.

Original issue HADOOP-12009 itself is reverted.  Issue will be fixed there itself.

Thanks [~brahmareddy].
